description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: International soccer at the Berlin Olympic Stadium; Germany making its contribution to the overall world economic upswing; Schleswig is a tourist attraction due to history and situation; technical monuments being restored; Electrically driven buses operate on public transport routes in Dusseldorf and Monchengladbach as an experiment; European Art Exhibition in West Berlin.
